sentences.sentence: Never have I seen such beauty.
sentences.translation_uz: Men hech qachon bunday go'zallik ko'rmagan edim.

sentences.sentence: Rarely do we get such opportunities.
sentences.translation_uz: Biz bunday imkoniyatlarni kamdan-kam qo'lga kiritamiz.

sentences.sentence: Seldom had she felt so happy.
sentences.translation_uz: U kamdan-kam o'zini bunday baxtli his qilgan edi.

sentences.sentence: Little did they know the truth.
No sooner had I arrived than it rained.
sentences.translation_uz: Men yetib kelishim bilan yomg'ir yog'a boshladi.
sentences.grammar_tip: No sooner + had + subject + V3 + than

sentences.sentence: Hardly had she spoken when the phone rang.
sentences.translation_uz: U gapirishi bilan telefon jiringlab qoldi.

sentences.sentence: Not only did he win but also broke the record.
sentences.translation_uz: U nafaqat yutdi, balki rekordni ham yangiladi.
sentences.grammar_tip: Not only + did + subject + verb + but also

sentences.sentence: Under no circumstances should you open that door.
sentences.translation_uz: Hech qanday sharoitda o'sha eshikni ochmang.
sentences.grammar_tip: Under no circumstances + should + subject + verb
